Uses of Package
com.here.android.mpa.odml

  • Packages that use com.here.android.mpa.odml 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.odml
    The ODML (On Device Map Loader) package provides classes, interfaces and enumerations which facilitate the download of map data for offline use.
  • Classes in com.here.android.mpa.odml used by com.here.android.mpa.odml 
    Class and Description
    MapLoader
    Facilitates the use of offline map data.
    MapLoader.Listener
    Represents a listener interface for receiving notifications from the MapLoader.
    MapLoader.MapPackageAtCoordinateListener
    Represents a listener interface with a callback which gets invoked upon package retrieval.
    MapLoader.ResultCode
    Represents values describing the status of a MapLoader operation.
    MapPackage
    Represents a model for obtaining information about offline map packages that can be installed using a MapLoader.
    MapPackage.InstallationState
    Represents values describing the installation state of the MapPackage
    MapPackage.SelectableDataGroup
    The data groups which may be optionally selected for offline map downloads.
